name: invidious
description: Invidious is a privacy focused alternative front end for YouTube. It proxies video, search and subscriptions without ads or tracking, supports RSS feeds and multiple clients, and can be self hosted as a lightweight video portal.
features: Privacy Protection: Watch YouTube without Google tracking your viewing habits.
Ad-Free Experience: No advertisements or sponsored content interrupting videos.
Subscription Management: Subscribe to channels without a Google account.
RSS Feeds: Generate RSS feeds for channels to follow in your feed reader.
Proxy Streaming: Stream videos through your server to hide your IP from YouTube.
Lightweight Interface: Fast, minimal UI focused on content over distractions.
Audio-Only Mode: Listen to videos without loading video streams to save bandwidth.
Multiple Instances: Connect to public instances or self-host your own.
